EmailTemplate.name: Webinar Response - Mar16 Terms Webinar
EmailTemplate.subject: Intapp Webinar Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName}: Thank you for registering for the "Intapp Open for Terms of Business Management" Webinar. It will take place on March 8th at 9am Pacific / 12pm Eastern / 5pm GMT. Please use the link below to add the event to your calendar, which contains the login information to access the webinar.
Add to Calendar: http://intapp.com/images/webinars/calendar-events/Intapp_Open_for_Terms.ics
http://www.intapp.com
